Full list
News fields shown in page module:Set the fields which should be shown in the page module by using the following syntax: label=fieldlist;label=fieldlist
Category fields shown in page module:Set the fields which should be shown in the page module.
Hide Media records:As the media elements should only be edited through the IRRE relation within a news record, they should be hidden in the list module.
Hide File records:As the file elements should only be edited through the IRRE relation within a news record, they should be hidden in the list module.
Enable DAM:Enable DAM if you want to use it
Show tt_news Importer:Backend module to import records from tt_news;tt_news needs to be installed too.
Prepend at copy: Prepend string "copy X".
Category restriction: Restrict the available categories in news records.
Categories from current page
Categories from page which is defined in page properties
Categories from site root
No restriction
Enable manual sorting of news records
Hide content element relation:If set, the relation to content elements is hidden and can't be used.
Use this overlay for news categories in the Backend
There are no languages available, so nothing to choose.
Start import with %s record(s).
